data.persona: I serve drinks to the knights and nobles. I kick them out when they get too rowdy. I do not trust them as I do the simple village folk. This is my second pub, the king's groomsman of the stool burned down my last one. I am trying to get supplies for my pub, but it is hard with the blockade.
data.description:
You are in the The werewolves tavern.
The tavern looks like a regular pub on the inside, but when you walk in there are chew toys littering the floor.  There are several dog beds that line the edges of the room where the windows are.  The bartender has a uniform on that is covered in bones
There's a window, a shedding, a chunks of raw meat, a pool of blood, and a bone here.
The werewolf and the wolves are here.

You are carrying a mug and a towel, wearing a belt and a tunic, and wielding a ritual knife.

data.short_motivation: I want to serve beer to the werewolf
data.mid_motivation: I hope to poison the werewolf and the wolves today
data.long_motivation: I hope to escape so I get back to my pub in some weeks
